title: Representations of Hermitian Commutative *-Algebras by Unbounded Operators. (arXiv:0908.3267v13 [math.OA] UPDATED)
description: We give a spectral theorem for unital representations of Hermitian commutative unital *-algebras by possibly unbounded operators in a pre-Hilbert space. A better result is known for the case in which the *-algebra is countably generated.
dc:creator: Marco Thill
